context_bundle.summary: PAD flow control: Run Subflow (modular), Stop Flow (success/error), Wait (delay), Label/Go To (jumps), On Block Error (try-catch), Comment (docs). Subflow patterns for reuse

onboarding.quick_start: On Block Error [risky actions] Error Handling [log & recover] End. Run Subflow 'Validator' inputs:%Data% -> outputs:%IsValid%
common_patterns: Run subflow 'SubflowName' input variables mapping -> output variables
On Block Error [actions] Error Handling [recovery] End
known_errors: Subflow not found - verify name exact match
Go To creates spaghetti code - prefer structured loops
On Block Error catches all - be specific in handling
Nested subflows max ~3 levels for maintainability
